details.description: They started with a high fever Yesterday. Little John was 38 and Melissa 38.5. Medicine helped a bit, but still they had a hard night. I wonder if playing at the park all day with this windy weather was a good idea. Hope Clara come backs soon from his trip to Lousiana, but wonder if it's a good idea to worry her and tell her about this situation.
Need to buy screws, I might need a wrench too.

I need to set up the alarm to a decent time.
I hope season 7 is better man...

title: Go to the movies with Caroll and Ames next Monday (@ The Marcus Mall probably)

details.description: We still have to decide which movie to see, but I think that steampunk western with girls in bikini might work for all of us
I'm going to find myself some time on Friday so I can make appropiate grocery shopping
These kanjis are getting harder and harder
